resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [Packaging] Build shared libraries for gandiva fat JAR via crossbow

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
praveenbingo opened a new pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835
 
 
   Added a crossbow task that can build and deploy gandiva jars to github releases.

praveenbingo commented on issue #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#issuecomment-432992951
 
 
   @kszucs - can you please review and let me know this looks ok.
   
   I am intending to get the ubuntu snapshot working e2e (upload snapshot jar in the crossbow repo and build fat jar that deploys to dremio repo, the later will be a job outside of crossbow.)
   
   Once it is done will pick up mac snapshot upload and the combiner.

kszucs commented on a change in pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#discussion_r228261411
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/gandiva/travis.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+# http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+os: linux
+dist: trusty
+sudo: required
+language: cpp
+services:
+  - docker
+
+# don't build twice
+if: tag IS blank
+
+env:
+  global:
+    - PLAT=x86_64
+    - TRAVIS_TAG={{ task.tag }}
+
+before_install:
+  - eval "${MATRIX_EVAL}"
+  - ulimit -c unlimited -S
+  - |
+      sudo bash -c "echo -e 'Acquire::Retries 10; Acquire::http::Timeout \"20\";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99-travis-retry"
+      sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
+      sudo apt-get update -qq
+matrix:
 
 Review comment:
   Please unnest the matrix entry. Currently We achieve parameterized build via defining multiple entries in tasks.yml with params key.

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

kszucs commented on a change in pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#discussion_r228262079
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/gandiva/travis.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+# http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+os: linux
+dist: trusty
+sudo: required
+language: cpp
+services:
+  - docker
+
+# don't build twice
+if: tag IS blank
+
+env:
+  global:
+    - PLAT=x86_64
+    - TRAVIS_TAG={{ task.tag }}
+
+before_install:
+  - eval "${MATRIX_EVAL}"
+  - ulimit -c unlimited -S
+  - |
+      sudo bash -c "echo -e 'Acquire::Retries 10; Acquire::http::Timeout \"20\";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99-travis-retry"
+      sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
+      sudo apt-get update -qq
+matrix:
+  fast_finish: true
+  include:
+  - compiler: gcc
+    language: cpp
+    os: linux
+    jdk: openjdk8
+    env:
+    - ARROW_TRAVIS_USE_TOOLCHAIN=1
+    - MATRIX_EVAL="CC=gcc-4.9 && CXX=g++-4.9"
+    before_script:
+    - git clone -b {{ arrow.branch }} {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+    - git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}
+    - mkdir -p dist
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_linux.sh
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_clang_tools.sh
+    - export TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/arrow
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_toolchain.sh
 
 Review comment:
   It will install dependencies via conda. Shouldn't the jar be self-contained?

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

kszucs commented on a change in pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#discussion_r228265099
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/gandiva/travis.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+# http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+os: linux
+dist: trusty
+sudo: required
+language: cpp
+services:
+  - docker
+
+# don't build twice
+if: tag IS blank
+
+env:
+  global:
+    - PLAT=x86_64
+    - TRAVIS_TAG={{ task.tag }}
+
+before_install:
+  - eval "${MATRIX_EVAL}"
+  - ulimit -c unlimited -S
+  - |
+      sudo bash -c "echo -e 'Acquire::Retries 10; Acquire::http::Timeout \"20\";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99-travis-retry"
+      sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
+      sudo apt-get update -qq
+matrix:
+  fast_finish: true
+  include:
+  - compiler: gcc
+    language: cpp
+    os: linux
+    jdk: openjdk8
+    env:
+    - ARROW_TRAVIS_USE_TOOLCHAIN=1
+    - MATRIX_EVAL="CC=gcc-4.9 && CXX=g++-4.9"
+    before_script:
+    - git clone -b {{ arrow.branch }} {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+    - git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}
+    - mkdir -p dist
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_linux.sh
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_clang_tools.sh
+    - export TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/arrow
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_toolchain.sh
+    - cd arrow/cpp
+    - mkdir build
+    - cd build
+    - export PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/bin:$PATH
+    - export BOOST_ROOT=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export PROTOBUF_HOME=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
+    - cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DARROW_GANDIVA=ON -DARROW_BUILD_UTILITIES=OFF
+    - make -j4
+    - ctest
 
 Review comment:
   IMO We should create the fat jar first, then install and test it - if it's possible.

kszucs commented on a change in pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#discussion_r228265652
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/gandiva/travis.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+# http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+os: linux
+dist: trusty
+sudo: required
+language: cpp
+services:
+  - docker
+
+# don't build twice
+if: tag IS blank
+
+env:
+  global:
+    - PLAT=x86_64
+    - TRAVIS_TAG={{ task.tag }}
+
+before_install:
+  - eval "${MATRIX_EVAL}"
+  - ulimit -c unlimited -S
+  - |
+      sudo bash -c "echo -e 'Acquire::Retries 10; Acquire::http::Timeout \"20\";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99-travis-retry"
+      sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
+      sudo apt-get update -qq
+matrix:
+  fast_finish: true
+  include:
+  - compiler: gcc
+    language: cpp
+    os: linux
+    jdk: openjdk8
+    env:
+    - ARROW_TRAVIS_USE_TOOLCHAIN=1
+    - MATRIX_EVAL="CC=gcc-4.9 && CXX=g++-4.9"
+    before_script:
+    - git clone -b {{ arrow.branch }} {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+    - git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}
+    - mkdir -p dist
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_linux.sh
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_clang_tools.sh
+    - export TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/arrow
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_toolchain.sh
+    - cd arrow/cpp
+    - mkdir build
+    - cd build
+    - export PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/bin:$PATH
+    - export BOOST_ROOT=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export PROTOBUF_HOME=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
+    - cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DARROW_GANDIVA=ON -DARROW_BUILD_UTILITIES=OFF
+    - make -j4
+    - ctest
+    script:
+    - cd $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/java
+    - mvn clean install -P gandiva -Dgandiva.cpp.build.dir=../../cpp/build/release
+    - cp gandiva/target/*.jar ../../dist/
+    - cd $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/..
+deploy:
+  provider: releases
+  api_key: $CROSSBOW_GITHUB_TOKEN
+  file_glob: true
+  file: dist/*.jar
+  skip_cleanup: true
+  on:
+    tags: true    
+
+notifications:
+  email:
+    - praveen@dremio.com
 
 Review comment:
   It should be `  - {{ job.email }}`

praveenbingo commented on a change in pull request #2835: ARROW-3385: [Gandiva][C++][Java] Crossbow support for deploying gandiva jars
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2835#discussion_r228423879
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/gandiva/travis.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+# http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+os: linux
+dist: trusty
+sudo: required
+language: cpp
+services:
+  - docker
+
+# don't build twice
+if: tag IS blank
+
+env:
+  global:
+    - PLAT=x86_64
+    - TRAVIS_TAG={{ task.tag }}
+
+before_install:
+  - eval "${MATRIX_EVAL}"
+  - ulimit -c unlimited -S
+  - |
+      sudo bash -c "echo -e 'Acquire::Retries 10; Acquire::http::Timeout \"20\";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99-travis-retry"
+      sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
+      sudo apt-get update -qq
+matrix:
+  fast_finish: true
+  include:
+  - compiler: gcc
+    language: cpp
+    os: linux
+    jdk: openjdk8
+    env:
+    - ARROW_TRAVIS_USE_TOOLCHAIN=1
+    - MATRIX_EVAL="CC=gcc-4.9 && CXX=g++-4.9"
+    before_script:
+    - git clone -b {{ arrow.branch }} {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+    - git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}
+    - mkdir -p dist
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_linux.sh
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_clang_tools.sh
+    - export TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/arrow
+    - arrow/ci/travis_install_toolchain.sh
+    - cd arrow/cpp
+    - mkdir build
+    - cd build
+    - export PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/bin:$PATH
+    - export BOOST_ROOT=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export PROTOBUF_HOME=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain
+    - export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/cpp-toolchain/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
+    - cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DARROW_GANDIVA=ON -DARROW_BUILD_UTILITIES=OFF
+    - make -j4
+    - ctest
+    script:
+    - cd $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/java
+    - mvn clean install -P gandiva -Dgandiva.cpp.build.dir=../../cpp/build/release
+    - cp gandiva/target/*.jar ../../dist/
+    - cd $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/..
+deploy:
+  provider: releases
+  api_key: $CROSSBOW_GITHUB_TOKEN
+  file_glob: true
+  file: dist/*.jar
+  skip_cleanup: true
+  on:
+    tags: true    
+
+notifications:
+  email:
+    - praveen@dremio.com
 
 Review comment:
   sure will change..

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: Deploy the packaged gandiva jar to maven snapshot repo from travis. Do this only for commits that modify gandiva.

comments.body: This might be easier as a nightly Crossbow job. [~kszucs] can assist with this

I've done with the part to use crossbow to automate the ubuntu packaging.

Waiting for credentials to start on the deploy.
